languages.text: "Зато теперь я пригляжу за тобой, дам убежище, хорошее оружие, броню и боевые стимуляторы, которые сделают твое сознание легким и тающим. Чем же ты недовол{mf|ен|ьна}, людишко?" {n}Злоба кажется расслабленным, но сонливая вялость в его голосе звучит неискренне.{/n}

"But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зато теперь я пригляжу за тобой, дам убежище, хорошее оружие, броню и боевые стимуляторы, которые сделают твое сознание легким и тающим. Чем же ты недовол{mf|ен|ьна}, людишко?" {n}Злоба кажется расслабленным, но сонливая вялость в его голосе звучит неискренне.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulators that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulators that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulators that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “但现在，我会照顾你。我会为你提供住处，优质的武器和盔甲，还有战斗兴奋剂，可以让你的头脑变得轻松愉悦。你还有什么不满的呢，小人儿？”{n}恶棍的语气听起来似乎很轻松，但那些拖长的懒散音节表明，他似乎是装出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “但现在，我会照顾你。我会为你提供住处，优质的武器和盔甲，还有战斗兴奋剂，可以让你的头脑变得轻松愉悦。你还有什么不满的呢，小人儿？”{n}恶棍的语气听起来似乎很轻松，但那些拖长的懒散音节表明，他似乎是装出来的。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Y ahora velaré por ti. Te daré cobijo, armas buenas, armadura y estimulantes de combate que harán que tu mente esté más ligera y tranquila. ¿Qué más quieres, human{mf|o|a}?». {n}Malicia parece relajado, pero dirías que está forzando el tono perezoso de su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora velaré por ti. Te daré cobijo, armas buenas, armadura y estimulantes de combate que harán que tu mente esté más ligera y tranquila. ¿Qué más quieres, human{mf|o|a}?». {n}Malicia parece relajado, pero dirías que está forzando el tono perezoso de su voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「しかし、今後は私が貴様の面倒を見よう。屋根を与え、良い武器と鎧を授け、戦闘用の増強剤を与える。悪い話ではないだろう、人間よ？」{n}マリスは気を抜いているように見えるが、気だるそうな声の裏に強引さも感じられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、今後は私が貴様の面倒を見よう。屋根を与え、良い武器と鎧を授け、戦闘用の増強剤を与える。悪い話ではないだろう、人間よ？」{n}マリスは気を抜いているように見えるが、気だるそうな声の裏に強引さも感じられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Doch von jetzt an beschütze ich Euch. Ich gebe Euch Zuflucht und gute Waffen, Rüstungen und Kampfstimulanzien, die Euren Verstand schön leicht und frei machen. Was gibt es daran auszusetzen, Menschling?" {n}Tücke wirkt entspannt, doch die träge Lockerheit in seiner Stimme hat etwas Erzwungenes an sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Doch von jetzt an beschütze ich Euch. Ich gebe Euch Zuflucht und gute Waffen, Rüstungen und Kampfstimulanzien, die Euren Verstand schön leicht und frei machen. Was gibt es daran auszusetzen, Menschling?" {n}Tücke wirkt entspannt, doch die träge Lockerheit in seiner Stimme hat etwas Erzwungenes an sich.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Mais désormais, je veillerai sur vous. Je vous donnerai un toit, des armes et une armure dignes de ce nom, ainsi que des stimulants pour le combat qui vous apaiseront l'esprit. Que demander de plus, {mf|humain|humaine} ? » {n}Derrière une apparence détendue, la lenteur et la paresse dans la voix de Démon semblent forcées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais désormais, je veillerai sur vous. Je vous donnerai un toit, des armes et une armure dignes de ce nom, ainsi que des stimulants pour le combat qui vous apaiseront l'esprit. Que demander de plus, {mf|humain|humaine} ? » {n}Derrière une apparence détendue, la lenteur et la paresse dans la voix de Démon semblent forcées.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Fakat artık arkandayım. Sana barınacak yer, iyi silahlar, zırhlar ve zihnini boşaltıp rahat ettirecek uyarıcılar vereceğim. Daha ne istiyorsun insancık?" {n}Melanet, rahatlamış görünse de sesindeki zoraki bir tembellik hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But now I'll look out for you. I'll give you shelter, and good weapons, armour, and combat stimulants that will make your mind light and easy. What's not to like, humanling?" {n}Malice appears relaxed, but the lazy drawl in his voice seems forced.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ama artık arkandayım. Sana barınacak yer, iyi silahlar, zırhlar ve zihnini boşaltıp rahat ettirecek uyarıcılar vereceğim. Daha ne istiyorsun insancık?" {n}Melanet rahatlamış görünüyor ama sesindeki tembellik istemli gibi geliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
